Dex - this dimensional cyberpunk shooter with elements of RPG, in which you have to fight with the corporations that control the world.

We will walk through the dark alleys of the city Harbor Prime. At the heart of the development of events in the game are the dialogues. It is on how we will lead ourselves and on the fate of the character. Throughout the game, we will participate in fights and skirmishes with the enemy. Use stealth mode. Open new pump and old skills and abilities. The game will be the story missions and side. Scene - will allow us to move forward on the storyline. Side - will allow us to earn money to buy equips
